title: News Index
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an Android device
custom_steps:
When a user navigates to the Android At Bat News Index
and then uses the Google app search some time after
custom_expected: Then the user will be able to quickly index previously viewed At Bat News Index

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user has navigated to the Android At Bat News Index
and begins to type "MLB News" in the device's Google app search
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then a link to the At Bat app titled "MLB News" will appear
and that link will bring the user to the MLB.com News Index in At Bat

title: Team News Index
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an Android device
custom_steps:
When a user navigates to the Android At Bat News Index for a specific team
and then uses the Google app search some time after
custom_expected: Then the user will be able to quickly index previously viewed At Bat Team News Indices

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user has navigated to the Android At Bat News Index for a specific team
and begins to type "[Team Name] News" in the device's Google app search
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then a link to the At Bat app titled "[Team Name] News" will appear
and that link will bring the user to the MLB.com News Index in At Bat

title: News Articles
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an Android device
custom_steps:
When a user views an Android At Bat News Article
and then uses the Google app search some time after
custom_expected: Then the user will be able to quickly index previously viewed At Bat News Articles

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user has viewed an Android At Bat News Article
and begins to type the News Article headline in the device's Google app search
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then a link to the At Bat app titled "[News Article Headline]" will appear
and that link will bring the user to that specific news article

title: Video Index
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an Android device
custom_steps:
When a user navigates to the Android At Bat MLB.com Video Index

custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then a link to the At Bat app titled "MLB Videos" will appear

title: Team Video Index
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an Android device
custom_steps:
When a user navigates to the Android At Bat Video Index for a specific team

custom_steps_separated.content:

custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then a link to the At Bat app titled "[Team Name] Videos" will appear

title: Video Highlights
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an Android device
custom_steps:
When a user views an At Bat Video
and then uses the Google app search some time after
custom_expected: Then the user will be able to quickly index previously viewed At Bat Videos

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user has viewed an At Bat Video
and begins to type the title of that Video in the device's Google app search
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then a link to the At Bat app titled "[Video Title]" will appear
and that link will bring the user to that specific video
and that video will start to play

title: Favorite Teams
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an Android device
and has favorite teams set in At Bat
custom_steps:
When a user navigates to Android At Bat Standings
and then uses the Google app search some time after

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user has navigated to Android At Bat Standings
and then begins to type "MLB Standings" in the device's Google app search
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then a link to the At Bat app titled "MLB Standings" will appear
and that link will bring the user to the MLB.com Standings page in At Bat
and that Standings page will respect the Favorite Teams setting

title: Team Page
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an Android handset or 7 inch tablet
custom_steps:
When a user navigates to an Android At Bat team page
and then uses the Google app search some time after
custom_expected: Then the user will be able to quickly index previously viewed At Bat Team Pages

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user has navigated to an Android At Bat team page
and then begins to type part of the team name (either location or name) in the device's Google app search
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then a link to the At Bat app titled "[Team Name]" will appear
and that link will bring the user to that Team Page in the app

and is viewing the "Active" roster tab
and then uses the Google app search some time after

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user has navigated to an Android At Bat Team Roster from that Team's Page
and has viewed the "Active" roster tab
and then begins to type "[Team Name] Roster" in the device's Google app search
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then a link to the At Bat app titled "[Team Name] Roster" will appear
and that link will bring the user to that team's "Active" Roster page in At Bat

custom_preconds: Given a user is on an Android handset or 7 inch tablet
custom_steps:
When a user navigates to an Android At Bat Team Roster from that Team's Page
and taps on the "40-Man" roster tab
and then uses the Google app search some time after
custom_expected: Then the user will be able to quickly index previously viewed At Bat Team "40-Man" Roster tabs

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user has navigated to an Android At Bat Team Roster from that Team's Page
and has viewed the "40-Man" roster tab
and then begins to type "[Team Name] 40-Man Roster" in the device's Google app search
custom_steps_separated.expected:

and that link will bring the user to that team's "40-Man" Roster page in At Bat

title: Schedule Calendar View
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an Android handset or 7 inch tablet
custom_steps:
When a user navigates to an Android At Bat Team Schedule from that Team's Page
and taps on the Calendar View
and then uses the Google app search some time after
custom_expected: Then the user will be able to quickly index previously viewed At Bat Team Schedule Calendar Views

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user has viewed the current month's Team Schedule Calendar view 
and begins to type "[Team Name] Schedule - This Month's Calendar" in the device's Google app search
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then a link to the At Bat app titled "[Team Name] Schedule - This Month's Calendar" will appear
and that link will bring the user to that team's Schedule Calendar view page for the current month in At Bat

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user has viewed a different month's Team Schedule Calendar view 
and begins to type "[Team Name] Schedule - [Month] [Year] Calendar" in the device's Google app search
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then a link to the At Bat app titled "[Team Name] Schedule - [Month] [Year] Calendar" will appear
and that link will bring the user to that team's Schedule Calendar view page for that month in At Bat

title: Schedule List View
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an Android handset or 7 inch tablet
custom_steps:
When a user navigates to an Android At Bat Team Schedule from that Team's Page
and taps on the List View
and then uses the Google app search some time after
custom_expected: Then the user will be able to quickly index previously viewed At Bat Team Schedule List Views

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user has viewed the current month's schedule List view
and begins to type "[Team Name] Schedule - This Month's List" in the device's Google app search
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then a link to the At Bat app titled "[Team Name] Schedule - This Month's List" will appear
and that link will bring the user to that team's Schedule List view page for the current month in At Bat

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user has viewed another month's schedule List view
and begins to type "[Team Name] Schedule - [Month] [Year] List" in the device's Google app search
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then a link to the At Bat app titled "[Team Name] Schedule - [Month] [Year] List" will appear
and that link will bring the user to that team's Schedule List view page for that month in At Bat

custom_steps:
When a user navigates to the Android At Bat MLB.TV EPG

title: MLB.TV - Live/Archive Feeds
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an Android device
custom_steps:
When a user has launched and played a live or archived MLB.TV feed in At Bat 
and then uses the Google app search some time after

(test for both live and archived feeds)
custom_expected: Then the user will be able to quickly index previously viewed At Bat MLB.TV live/archive feeds

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user has launched and played a live or archived MLB.TV feed in At Bat 
and begins to type "MLB.TV: [Away Team] @ [Home Team]" in the device's Google app search
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then a link to the At Bat app titled "MLB.TV: [Away Team] @ [Home Team]" will appear
and that link will bring the user to that MLB.TV feed

title: Gameday Audio EPG
custom_preconds: Given a user is on Android device
custom_steps:
When a user navigates to the Android At Bat Gameday Audio EPG
and then uses the Google app search some time after
custom_expected: Then the user will be able to quickly index the previously viewed At Bat Gameday Audio EPG

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user has navigated to the Android At Bat Gameday Audio EPG
and begins to type "Audio" in the device's Google app search
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then a link to the At Bat app titled "Audio" will appear
and that link will bring the user to the Gameday Audio EPG in At Bat

title: Gameday Audio - Live Feeds
custom_preconds: Given a user is on Android device
custom_steps:
When a user navigates to the Android At Bat Gameday Audio EPG
and has launched a live Gameday Audio feed
and then uses the Google app search some time after

(Note that this only applies to LIVE feeds, as Audio feeds are not archived on mobile)
custom_expected: Then the user will be able to quickly index the previously launched At Bat Gameday Audio LIVE feed EPG

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user has navigated to the Android At Bat Gameday Audio EPG
and has launched a LIVE Gameday Audio feed
and then begins to type "Audio: [Away Team] @ [Home Team]" in the device's Google app search
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then a link to the At Bat app titled "Audio: [Away Team] @ [Home Team]" will appear
and that link will bring the user to that LIVE Gameday Audio feed

title: News Indices
custom_preconds: Given Android device is set to Spanish
custom_steps:
When a user navigates to the Android At Bat News Indices in Spanish
and At Bat Spanish News articles in
and then uses the Google app search some time after
custom_expected: Then the user will be able to quickly index previously viewed At Bat News Indices & news articles in Spanish

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user begins to type "Noticias de MLB" in the device's Google app search
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then a link to the At Bat app titled "Noticias de MLB" will appear
and that link will bring the user to the MLB.com News Index in At Bat in Spanish

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user begins to type "Noticias de los [Team Name]" in the device's Google app search
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then a link to the At Bat app titled "Noticias de los [Team Name]" will appear
and that link will bring the user to the MLB.com News Index in At Bat in Spanish

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user begins to type a previously viewed Spanish News Article headline in the device's Google app search
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then a link to the At Bat app titled "[News Article Headline]" will appear
and that link will bring the user to that specific news article

custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then a link to the At Bat app titled "Videos de los [Team Name]" will appear
and that link will bring the user to that specific team's Video Index in At Bat in Spanish

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user begins to type the title of a previously played Spanish Video Highlight in the device's Google app search
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then a link to the At Bat app titled "[Video Title]" will appear
and that link will bring the user to that specific video
and that video will start to play

and has launched a live Gameday Audio feed
and then uses the Google app search some time after

and the previously launched At Bat Gameday Audio LIVE feed EPG
